GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
RDMA/rxe: Fix error unwind in rxe_create_qp()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 1a63f24e724f677db1ab21251f4d0011ae0bb5b5, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 8700e3e7c4857d28ebaa824509934556da0b3e76. For more details please see the references link.
